text: int max ( int * tempArray , int size ) { int maxNumber = tempArray [ 0 ] ; int i = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < size ; i ++ ) { if ( tempArray [ i ] > maxNumber ) { maxNumber = tempArray [ i ] ; } } } int main ( ) { int testCases ; int lineNumber ; int i = 0 ; int j = 0 ; int k = 0 ; int l = 0 ; int * array ; int large = 0 ; int sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & testCases ) ; for ( i ; i < testCases ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & lineNumber ) ; for ( j ; j < lineNumber ; j ++ ) { array = ( int * ) malloc ( ( j + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & array [ i ] ) ; } large = max ( array , j + 1 ) ; sum += large ; } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
